    import logging
    logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)
    if status == "Succeeded":
        logger.log(f"Copy activity succeeded for {filepath}")

        from notebookutils import mssparkutils
        creds = mssparkutils.credentials.getSecret(akv_name, secret_name, kv_linked_service)

        from azure.storage.fileshare import ShareFileClient
        file_client = ShareFileClient.from_connection_string(conn_str=creds, share_name=share_name, file_path=filepath)
        fileprops = file_client.get_file_properties()
        
        import datetime
        dt = datetime.datetime.now()

        from pyspark.sql.types import StructType
        import json
        from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
        spark = SparkSession.builder.getOrCreate()
        schema = StructType.fromJson(json.loads(jsonschema))
        new_raw_file = spark.createDataFrame([dt, filepath, fileprops.last_modified], schema)
        new_raw_file.write.format("delta").mode("append").saveAsTable(f"{db_name}.{table_name}")
        
    else:
        raise Exception(f"Transfer to raw for file {filepath} has failed")
